title: Star's character drawings!
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:monotypical]]
[!-- If you're seeing this, there are some secret messages in the fourth drawing's face. --]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Hey, I'm [[*user NebulousStar]], or just Star. Here are a few character sketches. (I'll probably update this page in the future.)

----

[[=]]
Mara Hyde (from [http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5643 SCP-5643]). Dated May 21, probably.

[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Astars-character-drawings/mara width="500px"]]

----

The unnamed god (from [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6241 SCP-6241]). Probably dated around August 8.

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:stars-character-drawings/unnamed%20god width="500px"]]

----

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6642 SCP-6642]. Dated around August 16.

[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Astars-character-drawings/6642 width="500px"]]

----

Something I'm still working on!

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:stars-character-drawings/IMG_4711.PNG width="500px"]]

----

A work-in-progress drawing of a work-in-progress author avatar!

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:stars-character-drawings/Juno width="500px"]]

----

A redesign of an old character.

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Astars-character-drawings/ataxia width="500px"]]

----

Another redesign of another character.

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Astars-character-drawings/Redesign width="500px"]]

[[/=]]
author: NebulousStar
